name: Colorees
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys: move cursor

Z: change color

The color of the cursor represents the color to change to. Match 3 or more tiles horizontally or vertically to gain points. Try to get the highest score in only 20 moves!

A game made in two days for the Novice Summer Jam Series: PICO-8 Jam. Inspired by Bit Generations: Coloris for the GBA.
